text: Nara Ramamurthy Naidu is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly from Chandragiri in the 1994 Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Telugu Desam Party.A challenge to CM from brother He is brother of former Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh Nara Chandrababu Naidu and father of actor Nara Rohit.AP CM Chandrababu Meets His Ailing Brother Ramamurthy NaiduTDP expels 10 supporters of Ramamurthy Naidu ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly Category:Telugu Desam Party politicians Category:People from Chittoor district Category:Members of the Andhra Pradesh Legislature, 1994–1999
title: Nara Ramamurthy Naidu
